title: the Iron Vanguard
intro: When the Primordial Dragon fell, its soul was shattered into six fragments of avatars that would later be referred to as the Dragon Knights, or the Draconis siblings. Argon is the second sibling, wielding the elemental power of earth and metal. He spends most of his time at the bastion, which he built all on his own over decades. He believes his primary duty of the siblings is not only to rule their people with an iron fist, but also to protect them with an iron wall.

abilities.name: Iron Armour
abilities.details:
Argon builds up layers of iron on his armour when not in combat, granting bonus physical resistance (scaling with physical resistance) each layer (maximum five layers).

Each time Argon takes physical damage, a layer will be destroyed and Argon will gain increased movement speed for a short duration. The movement speed boost can be stacked.

abilities.name: Colossal Smash
abilities.details:
Argon winds up his hammer and then smashes the ground, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) in a cone-shaped area and briefly slowing all enemies hit.

In addition, three Iron Pillars will rise up at the end of the cone, obstructing all units' movement.

Using this ability reduce Argon's physical resistance until the Iron Pillars shatter (each Iron Pillar reduces Argon's physical resistance separately.). The Iron Pillars will shatter after a few seconds or when interacted with Argon's other abilities.

Each of the Iron Pillars has three bars of health points. There will only be a maximum of three Iron Pillars on the ground.

abilities.name: Ferric Storm
abilities.details:
Argon creates floating iron shards around himself, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical resistance) to nearby enemies and reducing their attack speed.

Argon can recast this ability to recall the shards back to his armour, granting himself a shield (scaling with physical resistance).

If one or more Iron Pillars are present, Argon will shatter them during the recast to immediately recover his physical resistance stats and gains an even stronger shield based on the number of Iron Pillars shattered.

abilities.name: Heavy Slam
abilities.details:
Argon charges at a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit and pushing them back along the way.

If enemies are slammed into the Iron Pillars, they will shatter the pillars, taking physical damage (scaling with physical power) and getting stunned for a short duration.

Slamming the enemies into a terrain will stop the charge, deal less damage and they will be slowed instead of stunned.

abilities.name: Earth Breaker
abilities.details:
Argon channels his power to prepare a powerful attack. When unleashed, Argon smashes the ground, sending out a wave of rupture that deals physical damage (scaling with physical power) and knocks up enemies upon contact. The longer he charges the attack, the further the wave travels and the more damage it deals.

When the wave of rupture touches the Iron Pillars, it will shatter them, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical resistance) to surrouding enemies and briefly stunning them. If the enemies have already been knocked up, the stun effect takes place after the target lands.

Argon can still move while channeling his power, but will be slightly slower.

If the enemies stand behind the Iron Pillars, they will not be knocked up because the rupture wave would have stopped at the pillars. However, they can still be stunned when the Iron Pillars shatter if they stand too close.
